name: Postcards from a sleeping gods dreams

metadata.name: Postcard #1 - Ethereal buccaneers
metadata.description: The sleeping god had a dream about buccaneers who sailed towards the setting sun. The seas they roamed are long dried now, but their memories still remain. 3D art and animation made on Unreal Engine 4 by GaelDK. Music composed, performed and mixed on Cubase 11 by Aerosteak.
